WHAT IS FULL   ACCOUNT  MANAGEMENTIT IS PEACE OF MIND



You are here: Home1 / Services2 / Full Service Account Management

Mastering Amazon  isn’t a mystery; it requires a solid strategy and a skilled team.
Many brands face challenges when trying to scale profitably on Amazon due to a lack of a clear plan to reach their end goals. Additionally, the resource-intensive nature of Amazon can strain many brands’ capabilities.
PAS  addresses these challenges by offering a tailored, data-driven plan that focuses on maximizing profitability and growth. Our approach also alleviates your resource burden by providing access to highly experienced specialists giving the truth Remote E-Commerce fill. At PAS, we understand that there are no one-size-fits-all strategies, and we tailor our approach to meet your specific needs.


Navigating Amazon involves juggling numerous tasks, including content, organic rank, advertising, and catalog and more. The market’s unpredictability, influenced by trends, seasonality, competition, and policy changes, adds to the complexity. Finding balance becomes challenging when the ground is constantly shifting.

Highly skilled specialists dedicated to your success.
Proven methodologies tailored to your goals.
Utilizing data to inform and optimize strategies.

How it works


PLANNING 30,60,90 DAYS

Develop Tailore Brand Guidelines For Amazon By Understanding Your Brand’s Objectives And Requirements.
Organize Products Into An Optimization Hierarchy To Prioritize And Align Our Initial Actions Effectively.
Strategize And Optimize Advertisements And PPC Campaigns According To Our Research.
Create A Scaling Plan To Achieve Sustainable Long-Term Growth.

TEAM INTRODUCTION

Brand Director: Ensures Smooth Coordination Between PAS And Your Team. Overseeing Account Growth And Managing Marketing And Advertising.
Account Manager: Oversees The Well Being Of The Account Providing Such Values As Case Amnagegemtn Catalog And Troubleshooting, Inventory And Logistics
Amazon Strategist: Implements Insights To Boost Brand Visibility, Drive Sales, And Enhance Overall Marketplace Performance.

GRAPHIC DESIGN AND AMAZON CREATIVES

Guaranteed Number Of Optimized Listings Monthly
Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
Copywriting
Infographics
A+ Content

BI WEEKLY MEETINGS 

Align On Strategies And Expectation
Monthly Deliverables
Metrics Analysis
Progress Checks
Inform Next Steps




What is Included





CATALOG MERCHANDISING

Managing The Back-End Data On Amazon’s Selling Portal 
Load Data To Seller Central (Shell Listings) 
Parentage - Connecting Variations  Remove Listings 
Optimize Non-Customer Facing Attributes Such As UPCs, Category, SKUs 
Enabling Programs On The Account, Such As NARF (North America Remote Fulfillment) 
TROUBLESHOOTING

Mtroubleshooting Data Not Reflecting The Customer That Is On The Back End 
Image Suppressions
Missing BSR 
Forcing Updates To “Stick” Or Reflect On The Product Detail Page. (Seller Contribution Not Reflecting)
Case Log Management 
Account Health Checks
Building Plans Of Action And Submitting 
Seller Feedback Review And Removal (Not Guaranteed To Succeed) 
A-Z Claim Appeal Process. We Do Not Guarantee Successful Appeals
Chargeback Appeals
Advertising Campaign Rejection Appeals, For Example, Ad Bans.

PROMOTIONS

Holiday Strategy Management
Prime Day , Black Friday, Cyber Monday, Other Holidays As Pertinent
